posts.postText:

Proof?:  http://i55.tinypic.com/2chakqg.jpg   http://i55.tinypic.com/52kshk.jpg   http://i56.tinypic.com/141i79j.jpg   http://i55.tinypic.com/30mqy9v.jpg  i thought i took screenshots of the first killing, but i didn't he just ran at me and shot me in the face.
